interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit the Porn Shop in the evening after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Sensei decides to visit the porn shop again to embarrass Makoto while she is working. He is initially unable to find her, but hears the rustling of some boxes and follows the sound to find Makoto unpacking a box full of new dildos and stocking them on the shelves. Makoto immediately asks why he has not heeded her advice to not visit her at the shop, and points out several places they could go where she can show him a different side to her. Sensei pulls out the DVD he grabbed during his latest visit and shows it to her, where the cover is of a woman who looks strikingly similar to Makoto jerking off two guys at once. Makoto is aghast, and tells Sensei to put it away before she calls security, which he points out do not exist at the establishment. Makoto laments Sensei's changes between the start of the school year and now, and briefly looks back at the DVD, only to realize what the title implies, she becomes flustered all over again. She tries to get him to leave early again, only for him to say he's buying her a present, before grabbing a dildo out of the box on the floor between the two of them and immediately placing it into her hands. Makoto becomes even more flustered, rhetorically asking what she's supposed to do with the dildo, being a virgin, and Sensei suggests activating its vibrator function, before Makoto sighs, lamenting her new predicament. Sensei tells her he'll leave if she puts the dildo in her mouth for five seconds, and she heavily resists until Sensei points out she can just as easily do the same with the real thing, only for Makoto to finally cave and put the dildo in her mouth. He immediately snaps a picture, and Makoto pulls the dildo out quickly, indignantly demanding Sensei delete the picture from his phone. He assures her he won't use it to damage her reputation, and bolts out of the store, Makoto shouting indignantly the whole way, and he heads home to go to bed, the picture now the wallpaper on his phone.
trivia: Makoto will point out the park as a place she and Sensei can spend time if they have visited the park together .

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.4.
